name: Elite Qubo Power Fluid Trainer
description: Everyone loves the strong, silent type. The big, oil-immersed flywheel on this bike trainer generates high levels of resistance even at low speeds and keeps the noise level to a whisper. The Crono compass system adjusts for your weight and power to deliver a convincing road feel. The frame has a wide support surface and an optimized centre of gravity designed to provide a stable platform as you hammer home on a breakaway.Provides over 900 Watts of resistance at 60km/h.Elastogel roller reduces noise and tire wear.Fast fixing blocking mechanism allows easy, ergonomic blocking.Fits wheels from 20-29in.When paired with the optional (sold separately) Misuro B+ sensor, you can broadcast your training data (power, speed and cadence) over Bluetooth to your phone or tablet running your favourite training app.
